job_description:

NewAgeSys IT, a division of NewAgeSys, Inc., established in 1994 and based in New Jersey, specializes in mobile app development and consulting. They help clients maximize business reach and effectiveness using the latest technology. As a full-service mobile and web development firm, NewAgeSys IT services clients across North America, UK, Europe, Middle East, Singapore, and Australia. The ideal candidate will own test planning, execution, and process improvements to ensure projects meet the highest standards of quality, performance, and reliability. This role involves leading a team of QA engineers, collaborating with cross-functional teams, and implementing best practices to strengthen QA processes.

  • Manage test planning, test case design, execution, and defect management.
  • Evaluate and recommend automation frameworks, tools, and technologies to improve efficiency.

job_description:
cPanel Server Administrator

Company: Tricta Technologies (P) Ltd Location: Tricta Technologies Pvt Ltd., Technopark Phase 1, Trivandrum – 695581 Website: https://www.tricta.com Contact Email: careers@tricta.net Closing Date: December 24, 2025 Job Published: November 24, 2025

Job Overview

We are seeking a motivated and technically skilled Junior cPanel Server Administrator to join our infrastructure team. The ideal candidate will have solid hands-on experience in Linux administration, cPanel/WHM management, web hosting technologies, and troubleshooting production environments. This role involves providing L1 and L2 level support, ensuring server stability, performance, and security while assisting clients and internal teams.

Key Responsibilities

L1 & L2 Support Responsibilities

  • Provide L1 support for basic issues such as: email problems, DNS changes, password resets, SSL installations, account setups.
  • Provide L1 support for basic cPanel troubleshooting and customer guidance.
  • Provide L2 support for advanced hosting/server issues including: service failures (Apache, Exim, MySQL, PHP-FPM), resource usage investigation, performance optimization.
  • Provide L2 support for advanced DNS, web server configuration, database troubleshooting, malware cleanup, log analysis, and deeper diagnostics.
  • Escalate L3 cases to senior engineers with full technical notes and findings.

cPanel Hosting Management

  • Install, configure, and manage cPanel/WHM on production servers.
  • Manage accounts, DNS zones, email services, SSLs, backups, and service configurations.
  • Troubleshoot cPanel-related issues such as: Apache/Nginx errors, DNS/BIND/PowerDNS issues, Email queue problems (Exim/Postfix), MySQL/MariaDB connectivity.
  • Perform account transfers, migrations, restores, and server optimizations.

Linux System Administration

  • Manage Linux OS: RHEL, Debian, Ubuntu.
  • Handle updates, patching, hardening, process management, and log analysis.
  • Write basic automation scripts using Bash.
  • Work with virtualization tools like Virtualizor, KVM, VMware etc.
  • Configure and manage firewalls, IP tables, security groups, and network services.

Server Monitoring and Troubleshooting

  • Monitor servers using Zabbix, Nagios, Cacti.
  • Perform system diagnostics and troubleshoot from logs and SSH.
  • Conduct malware scanning, cleanup, and generate security reports.
  • Perform remote server operations via IPMI, iDRAC, and iBMC.

Required Skills

  • Strong understanding of Linux administration.
  • Knowledge of cPanel/WHM, DNS, web hosting services, and email protocols.
  • Good troubleshooting skills for L1 and L2 tasks.
  • Knowledge of malware types, scanning tools, and server security practices.
  • Good understanding of networking (ports, protocols, DNS, firewalls).

Preferred Qualifications

  • RHCSA / RHCE certifications.
  • Experience in hosting and data center infrastructure.
  • Very good understanding of virtualization technologies.
summary: Seeking a Junior cPanel Server Administrator with 1+ years of Linux and cPanel experience. Role involves L1/L2 support, server management, and troubleshooting.
